name: Head of the Legion Beast
description: This item does 40% more damage to Human and Undead monsters, 30% more damage to Dragon monsters, and gives 30% more class points, XP, gold, and rep when equipped. The Beast was trapped by its original seal. Virgil was be able to restore its seal to full strength and Dage is free from its influence. Anything less that full victory would have resulted in the destruction of Lore.
